aboutPage.title: About HAM Radio Marketplace
aboutPage.intro: HAM Radio Marketplace is a free, open-source platform dedicated to connecting amateur radio operators worldwide for buying and selling equipment.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We believe that amateur radio equipment should be accessible to everyone in the HAM community. Our platform provides a safe, transparent, and user-friendly marketplace where operators can find quality equipment at fair prices, while also giving sellers a trusted platform to reach fellow enthusiasts.

features.title: Key Features
features.free: Completely free to use - no listing fees, no selling fees
features.multilingual: Multilingual support (English, Serbian, Icelandic, Bulgarian, Romanian, German)
features.ratings: Built-in rating system to build trust between buyers and sellers
features.community: Made by radio operators, for radio operators

developer.title: About the Developer
developer.content: This project was created by Brixi, an amateur radio operator and software developer with a passion for connecting the HAM radio community through technology.

getStarted.title: Ready to Get Started?
getStarted.content: Join our community today and start buying or selling amateur radio equipment with fellow operators around the world.

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.content: Sign up with your email and complete your profile. Add your callsign, location, and contact information to build trust with buyers.

step2.title: List Your Equipment
step2.content: Create a detailed listing with photos, description, condition, and price. Be honest and thorough to attract serious buyers.

step3.title: Communicate with Buyers
step3.content: Respond promptly to inquiries. Answer questions honestly and provide additional information or photos if requested.

step4.title: Complete the Sale
step4.content: Once sold, mark the item as sold, arrange payment and shipping directly with the buyer, and leave feedback to build your reputation.

step1.title: Browse Listings
step1.content: Search by category, manufacturer, price range, or location. Use filters to find exactly what you're looking for.

step2.title: Contact the Seller
step2.content: Ask questions about the equipment, request additional photos, and discuss payment and shipping options.

step3.title: Make the Purchase
step3.content: Agree on terms with the seller, arrange secure payment, and confirm shipping details. Always use secure payment methods.

step4.title: Leave Feedback
step4.content: After receiving your item, rate your experience with the seller to help build trust in the community.

tips.title: Tips for Success
tips.tip1: Always communicate through the platform initially to maintain a record of your conversations
tips.tip2: Check seller ratings and reviews before making a purchase
tips.tip3: Use detailed photos and descriptions to attract serious buyers
tips.tip4: Be responsive and professional in all communications
tips.tip5: When shipping, use tracking and insurance for valuable items

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about using HAM Radio Marketplace
faqPage.q1: Is HAM Radio Marketplace really free?
faqPage.a1: Yes! There are no listing fees, no selling fees, and no hidden charges. We're a community-driven, open-source project.
faqPage.q2: Do I need a HAM license to use this platform?
faqPage.a2: No, you don't need a license to browse or buy equipment. However, we encourage responsible use and compliance with your local regulations.
faqPage.a3: Payments are arranged directly between buyers and sellers. We recommend using secure payment methods like PayPal, bank transfers, or meeting in person for local transactions.
faqPage.q4: What if I have a dispute with a buyer or seller?
faqPage.a4: We encourage users to resolve disputes directly. If that's not possible, you can report problematic listings or users. Remember, all transactions are between individual users.
faqPage.a5: International shipping is arranged between buyer and seller. Check our Shipping Guide for tips on customs, insurance, and carrier recommendations.
faqPage.q6: Can I edit or delete my listing?
faqPage.a6: Yes! You can edit your listings at any time and delete them when no longer needed. Just go to 'My Listings' in your account.
faqPage.q7: How does the rating system work?
faqPage.a7: After a successful transaction, both buyers and sellers can rate each other. These ratings help build trust in the community.
faqPage.a8: We prohibit illegal items, counterfeit goods, stolen equipment, and anything that violates local laws. See our Community Guidelines for details.
faqPage.q9: How do I report a suspicious listing?
faqPage.a9: Click the 'Report Listing' button on any listing page and provide details about your concerns. We review all reports promptly.
faqPage.a10: We take privacy seriously. Your contact information is only visible to logged-in users, and you control what information you share. See our Privacy Policy for details.

safetyTipsPage.title: Safety Tips
safetyTipsPage.subtitle: Stay safe when buying and selling amateur radio equipment

buyers.title: For Buyers
buyers.tip1: Check seller ratings and reviews before purchasing
buyers.tip2: Ask for detailed photos and test results if buying used equipment
buyers.tip3: Use secure payment methods that offer buyer protection
buyers.tip4: Be cautious of deals that seem too good to be true
buyers.tip5: For local pickups, meet in public places during daylight hours

sellers.title: For Sellers
sellers.tip1: Be honest about the condition of your equipment
sellers.tip2: Take clear, well-lit photos from multiple angles
sellers.tip3: Use tracked shipping with insurance for valuable items
sellers.tip4: Don't ship items until payment is confirmed and cleared
sellers.tip5: Keep records of all communications and transactions

redFlags.title: Red Flags to Watch For
redFlags.flag1: Buyers or sellers who refuse to communicate through the platform
redFlags.flag2: Requests for payment through unusual methods (gift cards, cryptocurrency to unknown addresses)
redFlags.flag3: Pressure to complete the transaction quickly without proper verification
redFlags.flag4: Unwillingness to provide additional photos or information
redFlags.flag5: Prices significantly below market value without good explanation

general.title: General Safety Guidelines
general.tip1: Trust your instincts - if something feels wrong, it probably is
general.tip2: Never share sensitive personal information like passwords or financial details
general.tip3: Report suspicious activity or listings immediately

shippingGuidePage.title: Shipping Guide
shippingGuidePage.subtitle: Best practices for shipping amateur radio equipment safely

packaging.title: Packaging Guidelines
packaging.tip1: Use sturdy boxes with adequate padding (bubble wrap, foam, or packing peanuts)
packaging.tip2: Wrap antennas and fragile components separately
packaging.tip3: Remove or secure any loose parts to prevent damage during transit
packaging.tip4: Double-box valuable or fragile items for extra protection
packaging.tip5: Seal boxes with strong packing tape, reinforcing all seams

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.tip1: Include a packing slip with item description and tracking number
documentation.tip2: Keep copies of all shipping receipts and tracking information
documentation.tip3: For international shipments, complete customs forms accurately
documentation.tip4: Consider including a copy of the original manual if available

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.content: For valuable equipment, always purchase shipping insurance. The cost is minimal compared to potential loss. Document the item's condition with photos before shipping.

receiving.title: Receiving Shipments
receiving.tip1: Inspect packages for damage before accepting delivery
receiving.tip2: Document any visible damage with photos immediately
receiving.tip3: Open packages carefully and inspect contents thoroughly
receiving.tip4: Test equipment promptly after receiving it

inspection.title: Inspection Checklist
inspection.tip1: Check that all described components and accessories are included
inspection.tip2: Verify the equipment matches the listing description and photos
inspection.tip3: Test all functions if possible before leaving feedback

customs.title: Customs
customs.content: Be aware that international shipments may incur customs duties and taxes. These are the buyer's responsibility unless otherwise agreed.

vat.title: VAT/Import Taxes
vat.content: Many countries charge VAT or import taxes on items above certain values. Check your local regulations.

regulations.title: Regulations
regulations.content: Some radio equipment may require special permits or licenses to import. Verify compliance with both export and import regulations.

carriers.title: Recommended Carriers
carriers.intro: Choose carriers based on destination, package size, and value:
carriers.nationalDesc: Cost-effective for lighter items and domestic shipping
carriers.internationalDesc: Better tracking and insurance options for international and valuable shipments

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using HAM Radio Marketplace, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our platform.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use this platform. By using this service, you represent that you meet this age requirement and have the legal capacity to enter into these terms.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.responsibility1: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
userAccounts.responsibility2: All activities that occur under your account
userAccounts.responsibility3: Providing accurate and current information in your profile

listings.title: Listings and Content
listings.content: When creating listings, you agree to:
listings.rule1: Provide accurate descriptions and photos of items
listings.rule2: Only list items you own and have the right to sell
listings.rule3: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
listings.rule4: Not post prohibited, illegal, or counterfeit items

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.content: HAM Radio Marketplace is a platform connecting buyers and sellers. We are not party to any transactions and do not guarantee the quality, safety, or legality of items listed. All transactions are directly between users.

prohibitedConduct.title: Prohibited Conduct
prohibitedConduct.item1: Post false, misleading, or fraudulent listings
prohibitedConduct.item2: Harass, threaten, or abuse other users
prohibitedConduct.item3: Attempt to circumvent platform fees or policies
prohibitedConduct.item4: Use automated tools to scrape or collect data
prohibitedConduct.item5: Violate intellectual property rights of others

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The platform and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by the developer and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: This platform is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee continuous, uninterrupted, or secure access to the platform.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the platform.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these terms or for any other reason at our discretion.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through the Contact page.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how HAM Radio Marketplace collects, uses, and protects your personal information. We are committed to protecting your privacy and being transparent about our data practices.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect the following types of information:

profile.title: Profile Information
profile.items: Display name, location (country/city), contact information (if you choose to make it public), biography

listings.title: Listing Information
listings.items: Item descriptions, photos, pricing, and transaction history

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.items: IP address, browser type, pages visited, timestamps

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.purpose2: Enable communication between buyers and sellers
dataUse.purpose3: Improve user experience and platform features
dataUse.purpose4: Prevent fraud and enforce our Terms of Service
dataUse.purpose5: Send important updates about your account or the platform

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We only share information:
dataSharing.case1: With other users as necessary for transactions (contact info if you make it public)
dataSharing.case2: When required by law or legal process
dataSharing.case3: To protect our rights or the safety of users

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use essential cookies to maintain your session and preferences. We do not use third-party advertising cookies.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.right1: Access, update, or delete your personal information
userRights.right2: Object to processing of your data

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your information as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. You can request deletion of your account and data at any time.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our platform is not intended for users under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from children.

changes.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify users of significant changes by email or through the platform.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us through the Contact page.

guidelinesPage.title: Community Guidelines
guidelinesPage.subtitle: Help us maintain a safe, respectful, and thriving marketplace for the HAM radio community

respect.title: Be Respectful
respect.content: Treat all users with courtesy and respect, regardless of experience level or background.
respect.rule1: Use professional language in all communications

honesty.title: Be Honest
honesty.content: Honesty is the foundation of trust in our community.
honesty.rule1: Describe items accurately, including all defects or issues
honesty.rule2: Use your own photos - don't copy images from other sources
honesty.rule3: Honor your commitments to buyers and sellers
honesty.rule4: Disclose any modifications or repairs to equipment

safety.title: Prioritize Safety
safety.content: Your safety and the safety of others is paramount.
safety.rule1: Follow our Safety Tips for secure transactions
safety.rule3: Never share sensitive personal information publicly

communication.title: Communicate Clearly
communication.rule1: Respond promptly to messages and inquiries
communication.rule2: Be clear about terms, conditions, and expectations

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.item1: Posting counterfeit, stolen, or illegal items
prohibited.item5: Attempting to manipulate ratings or reviews

reporting.title: Reporting Violations
reporting.content: If you encounter content or behavior that violates these guidelines, please report it immediately. We review all reports and take appropriate action.

consequences.title: Consequences of Violations
consequences.content: Violations of these guidelines may result in:

spirit.title: The Spirit of HAM Radio
spirit.content: These guidelines reflect the values of the amateur radio community: experimentation, learning, community service, and mutual respect. Let's work together to maintain these traditions in our marketplace.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: Get in touch with the developer or find helpful resources

project.title: About the Project
project.description: HAM Radio Marketplace is an open-source project built with love for the amateur radio community. Contributions, feedback, and suggestions are always welcome!

support.title: Support
support.content: For questions about using the platform, check our FAQ first. For bug reports or feature suggestions, please open an issue on GitHub.

beforeContacting.title: Before Contacting
beforeContacting.checkFaq: Check the FAQ for common questions
